name: CITY OF EAST PROVIDENCE v. LOCAL 850 INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF FIREFIGHTERS et al.
name_abbreviation: City of East Providence v. Local 850 International Ass'n of Firefighters

parties: CITY OF EAST PROVIDENCE v. LOCAL 850 INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF FIREFIGHTERS et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied. The respondent’s motion for counsel fee is denied.

attorneys: Orlando A. Andreoni, City Sol., East Providence, for petitioner.
Taft, McSally & McKenna, James J. McKenna, Providence, for respondents.
casebody.head_matter:
CITY OF EAST PROVIDENCE v. LOCAL 850 INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF FIREFIGHTERS et al.
No. 81-6-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Feb. 11, 1981.
Orlando A. Andreoni, City Sol., East Providence, for petitioner.
Taft, McSally & McKenna, James J. McKenna, Providence, for respondents.
